thread.title: The LG G6 has a hidden face, and it’s impossible to unsee | TechCrunch
thread.title_full: The LG G6 has a hidden face, and it’s impossible to unsee | TechCrunch

author: Matt Burns
title: The LG G6 has a hidden face, and it’s impossible to unsee | TechCrunch
text:
The LG G6 has a hidden face, and it’s impossible to unsee Posted Freshly FCC-approved LTE-U wireless rolls out on T-Mobile this spring 
Images of the LG G6 leaked today and overall it looks like a solid phone with soft lines, very little bezel and a face on the backside made up of the dual lenses and power button. It looks surprised and maybe a little shocked. 
LG will likely reveal all the details of the phone next week at Mobile World Congress. 0
